marklogic.body:
Â This whole freaking out over Mass Effect 3's ending is why everyone looks at gamers like children and socially-inept weirdos. I enjoy my video game time but I'm not a Cry baby or child if a game doesn't end the way I
want it to. Sad world we live in. There's a lot bigger problems going on in the world than to flip out over a video game. I would hope that some of you might read this and realize how absolutely silly you're all being and take what you can get cause some people aren't even fortunate enough to "waste" sixty dollars on a game or even enough to feed themselves. If you disagree and want to insist that it is a HUGE deal then go right ahead America gives us that freedom, but you also have to see how spoiled we are as a culture to have everyone Act like this.
